page.title: 14HOME LIFE - IDEN GREEN
page.content: We have a greater proportion of older{residents}but in recent year an interesting development has been the influx of younger families. In the 20 residences of the village street we now have infants and school children. 12 similar families live within quarter mile. A composite picture of these younger families would show father, mother and two children living in a detached house with fairly spacious accommodation and running two cars. The daughter is at infant school, the son only two. Both parents work, he fulltime, she for part of the week. child care, running of the house and shopping are shares tasks. Daytime activities are, for the most part, based in and around the Village;ballet lessons,playschool,toddler group, swimming and visits to friends houses.
